thread.title: Nintendo's First Smartphone Game Will Be Announced "Soon"
thread.title_full: Nintendo's First Smartphone Game Will Be Announced "Soon"

title: Nintendo's First Smartphone Game Will Be Announced "Soon"
text:
Nintendo's First Smartphone Game Will Be Announced "Soon" 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
The first of Nintendo's new smartphone games that it's making in collaboration with DeNA will be announced "soon." That's according to DeNA ...
